name: Rubik's Cube (itch) (SnorreKG)
description:
A digital rubik's cube.

Controls:
p - menu screen

r - right
l - left
f - front
n - back
t - top
b - bottom

- Hold right mouse button to spin the sides counter clock.

- Hold left mouse button and drag the mouse to turn around. Let go and the camera will return to default postion.
